sentence: Su valor patrimonial, su arquitectura, sus diferentes etapas, esas historias que han ocurrido en su interior y que se han transmitido de padres a hijos y otros muchos detalles de interés durante la conferencia La Casa de Misericordia.
translation: Its heritage value, its architecture, its different stages, those stories that have taken place inside and have been passed down from generation to generation, and many other interesting details during the conference 'La Casa de Misericordia.'

sentence: Es lo que contó Juan Ignacio Ferrández, cronista de la ciudad de Cartagena, este lunes, en la UPCT, durante la conferencia que pronunció con motivo del vigésimo aniversario de la Universidad de Mayores.
translation: This is what Juan Ignacio Ferrández, the chronicler of the city of Cartagena, shared this Monday at UPCT during the conference he gave on the occasion of the twentieth anniversary of the University of Elders.

sentence: La antigua Casa de Misericordia es un edificio modernista construido por el arquitecto Víctor Beltrí.
translation: The old Casa de Misericordia is a modernist building designed by the architect Víctor Beltrí.

sentence: Es la sede del Rectorado de la UPCT desde 2001.
translation: It has been the headquarters of the UPCT Rectorate since 2001.

sentence: Con anterioridad acogió a una institución benéfica dedicada al cuidado de los niños desamparados a cargo de las Hijas de San Vicente de Paúl, conocidas como Hermanas de la Caridad.
translation: Previously, it housed a charitable institution dedicated to the care of underprivileged children under the responsibility of the Daughters of Saint Vincent de Paul, known as the Sisters of Charity.

sentence: Esta actividad la han organizado el vicerrectorado de Estudiantes, Cultura y Deportes y UMAY.
translation: This activity was organized by the Vice Chancellorship of Students, Culture, and Sports, and UMAY.
